name: SoulStick
description:
NOTICE: Webgl currently has a few performance issues! If you want to reach some highscores its better to used the windows buildControls: WASD- Dash (directional) Left Click- Shoot Gun

Go up as far as you can!

Blue orbs- Amount of dashes. Recharges every time you land Red shells- Ammo count. Reloads after running out Hearts- Health Icons- Upgrades. Red is shell upgrades and blue is ghost upgrades. Only 1 per slot

______________________________________________________________________________________

The giant double barrel boomstick and his friendly ghost wants to go upwards for some reason (Idk why, they won't tell me. Probably because neither can speak). Help them by using the boomstick's recoil and the ghosts dash!

Entire map is randomly generated, with 14 upgrades and 49 upgrade combinations!

PS. Destroy other guns to prove a point while youre at it. I heard it gives some juicy exp

Update 1.2:

> Fixed some bugs relating to the leaderboard

> Changed up how the leaderboard works slightly 

> Bug fixes, lots of bug fixes

> QOL improvements

> Performance optimisations

Update 1.1:

 > Added leaderboard

> Added 6 new upgrades

      > Mega shells

      > Mini shells

      > Heli shells

      > Anti ghost

      > Fit ghost

      > Angle ghost

> Some bug fixes

> More polish
